articles.author: Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: South Korea stocks dip 2% leading region's losses as traders parse China trade data, RBA rate hike - CNBC
articles.description: South Korean stocks fell 2%, leading losses in the wider Asia-Pacific region as investors parse trade data coming out of China, as well as RBA's rate hike.
articles.content:
Altcoins rose on Monday after ether hit $1,900 over the weekend for the first time since July.
Litecoin added 3.4% while Ripple's XRP rose 9.1%. In the decentralized finance sector, the tokens tied … [+920 chars]

articles.title: Caffeine's role in sports: Timing of intake subject to significant debate - researcher - NutraIngredients-Asia
articles.description: There is currently significant debate taking place over the timing for athletes to consume caffeine and reap the most benefits, a leading sports science researcher has pointed out.
articles.content:
Caffeine, when consumed as a sports supplement, could help improve sports performance. Existing evidence has shown that it could reduce pain and is associated with an increase in adrenaline levels.
